title: Growing corn in garden organically | How-2-Do It Guide Step By Step | Best Guide

tasks.task: Growing corn at home or in a garden
subtasks: Using a fork to till and break soil
Preparing organic fertilizer by breaking down cow, buffalo, or goat dung
Removing stones or pebbles from fertilizer
Mixing soil and fertilizer with a spade and fork
Breaking up lumps in soil and fertilizer mixture
Preparing a raised rectangular area for sowing at least 10 cm high
Sowing corn seeds 1 inch deep, spaced 15 to 20 cm apart
Watering the soil abundantly after sowing
Waiting 7 to 10 days for sprouts to appear
